blogs.title: What is and is not “wellness”?
blogs.summary:
From “What is wellness now?” by Anna Kirkland:

wikipedia.title: Wellness (alternative medicine)
wikipedia.summary: Wellness is generally used to mean a state beyond absence of illness but rather aims to optimize well-being.
